text: Painting by Aristidis Vlassis. Aristidis Vlassis (; 1947 – 26 May 2015) was a Greek painter and engraver. == Early years == Vlassis was born and raised in Heraklion, where he was tutored in painting by Androgeos Alexandridis (). == Career == Vlassis lived in Heraklion until 1994, then moved to Athens, where he lived and worked until his death. Human beings and all aspects of their life are a central theme in his creations. He presented 23 solo exhibitions and participated in 16 group exhibitions."Έφυγε" ξαφνικά ο σπουδαίος Ηρακλειώτης ζωγράφος, Αριστείδης Βλάσσης, ενώ εξελισσόταν ή έκθεση του... Candia News 27 May 2015 .
